attributes.title: Such racist app doesn’t support lgbtq+ rights it give straight vibes
attributes.review: I opened the app and it said horrid things about lgbtq+ and I took my phone and dug a 6 foot hole and buried it in my yard I decided to dig it up and soak it in gasoline and throw it in the hole and light it on fire

attributes.title: ew
attributes.review: This app is terrible, you’d have to be so brainwashed to buy any merch and trump is dead anyways so idk why y’all are believing FAKE NEWS which isn’t even talking about his death and trying to cover it up.

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP I REPEAT DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP, IT HAS A VIRUS THAT HACKS ALL YOUR CREDIT CARD INFO, YOUR SOCIAL SECURITY NUMBER, AND IT ALSO BLEW UP MY MICROWAVE! As soon as I downloaded the app, it started playing four💞in💞her and it started to glitch out my phone, not only that but took me 42,069 hours for it to download, this app is trash.

attributes.title: DANGEROUS APP📵
attributes.review: If you are thinking of downloading this app PLEASE DO NOT. It steals your info and hacks into your phone. I was foolish to download it and it is a decision a REGRET. The people running the app CANNOT BE TRUSTED. Stay safe and don’t even risk downloading this awful horrible app. Kisses💗✨🦋🌈✌🏻

attributes.title: ew✨
attributes.review: by far the WORST app i’ve ever downloaded. slow loading page, many typos, small bugs, and is overall a HUGE scam. do NOT get this app and Apple PLEASE take it off of the app store. thank you!

attributes.title: This isn’t worth getting
attributes.review: It’s a terrible app. It took forever for me to download it. And it takes a lot of space on my phone... not worth it

attributes.title: DISSAHPOINTED😡
attributes.review: I was livid to try President Trump’s app, as I am a huge fan. He is my everything. As soon as I downloaded the app though, all of these weird symbols popped up and I think the Chinese government hacked my phone. You can do better Mr. Trump🤬🤬🤬
attributes.userName: buY I don't wanna be happee😜

attributes.review: Fist of all this is the worst app ever 🤮it took so long to download and messed my phone up and you’d think if he loved his app as much as he does Twitter the app would’ve been better 🤔🤦🏼‍♀️

attributes.title: too long
attributes.review: downloaded this app while i was waiting for jesus to be born and it just now finished downloading i just wanted to be able to support my president😭 never again DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME!!!!

attributes.title: Didn’t work for me!
attributes.review: I really wanted to support my president. But the app took way too long to download and was granted access to my information! Bad review! Never recommend!
